sentences.en: " Well, when are you going to mow it?
sentences.cn: “ 我说, 你打算什么时候干?

sentences.en: He continued to mow the lawn and do other routine chores.
sentences.cn: 他继续剪草坪，并做些其他日常杂务。

sentences.en: He hired a man to mow the lawn.
I don't think I can mow the lawn.
I have get to hang up mow. I have a class.
sentences.cn: 我现在得挂断了. 我有课.

sentences.en: I have to pay my bill mow. The name is Jack London. Room 254.
sentences.cn: 我现在得付账了. 姓名是杰克伦敦, 254房间.

sentences.en: I'm cheesed off with having to mow the lawn every week.
sentences.cn: 每个星期都得刈草坪真把我烦死了.

sentences.en: It’s time to mow the lawn again.
mowed down the opposition with strong arguments.
sentences.cn: 用强有力的论据驳倒对方

sentences.en: Our difficulties may be mountains high, but we'll mow them down.
sentences.cn: 那怕困难和山一样高, 我们也要克服它们.

sentences.en: The grass is getting too long, we must mow the lawn.
sentences.cn: 草越来越长了, 我们必须割草坪.

sentences.en: The mower firmly refused to mow, so I decided to dismantle it.
sentences.cn: 修完后割草机还是纹丝不动, 于是,我决定把它拆开.

sentences.en: The proposed amalgamation of the two institutes has mow fallen through.
sentences.cn: 这两个研究所打算合并的事现在已经落空了.

sentences.en: They set him to mow the lawn.
We have to mow down the long grass regularly.
We shall have to mow down the tall grass in the big field.
sentences.cn: 我们得把大田里的高草割掉.

sentences.en: You wouldn't want to mow the lawn, but if they get in, we hear them.
sentences.cn: 你不想要剪草地, 但是这样,它们来了我们就会知道.

phrases.phrase: As you sow you shall mow .

phrases.tran_cn: （用交通工具或枪）杀死，撂倒，扫倒

trans.tran_en: the part of a barn where hay, straw, etc, is stored
to cut grass using a machine

trans.tran_cn: 刈，割，扫射，皱眉头，扮鬼脸
